item.title: Catalyst cares about your old code
item.description: 09:52 wow.. you can actually see how old that code is 10:00 but it still runs without a single modification. nice! 10:00 catalyst++ 10:14 rafl: try that with rails :) 10:14 no, thanks Code rot is everywhere, but some platforms suffer more than others. Even Simple C++ code suffers from code rot.
